languages.text: This backpack grants its wearer a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} or strike count for any weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks.
languages.original_text: Этот рюкзак дает персонажу +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельности{/g} или числу ударов при использовании любого оружия, которое может атаковать {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g}.

traits.locale_text: This backpack grants its wearer a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} or strike count for any weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks.
This backpack grants its wearer a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} or strike count for any weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks.
This backpack grants its wearer a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} or strike count for any weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks.

languages.text: 装备者使用任何可以{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}攻击的武器进行攻击时，{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}或攻击次数提高1点。
languages.original_text: This backpack grants its wearer a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} or strike count for any weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks.

traits.locale_text: 装备者使用任何可以{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}攻击的武器进行攻击时，{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}或攻击次数提高1点。

languages.text: Этот рюкзак дает персонажу +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельности{/g} или числу ударов при использовании любого оружия, которое может атаковать {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g}.
languages.original_text: This backpack grants its wearer a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} or strike count for any weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks.

traits.locale_text: Этот рюкзак дает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельности{/g} при использовании любого оружия, стреляющего {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}очередями{/g}.
Этот рюкзак дает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельности{/g} при использовании любого оружия, стреляющего {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}очередями{/g}.

languages.text: このバックパックは使用者に、{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}連射{/g}攻撃が可能な武器に対して、+1の{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}発射速度{/g}または攻撃回数を付与する。
languages.original_text: This backpack grants its wearer a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} or strike count for any weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks.

traits.locale_text: このバックパックは着用者に、{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}攻撃が可能な武器に対して、+1の{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}発射速度{/g}または攻撃回数を付与する。

languages.text: Esta mochila otorga a su portador un +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} o número de golpes para cualquier arma con ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g}.
languages.original_text: This backpack grants its wearer a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} or strike count for any weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks.

traits.locale_text: Esta mochila otorga a su portador un +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} o número de golpes para cualquier arma con ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g}.

languages.text: Dieser Rucksack gewährt seinem Träger einen Bonus von +1 auf die {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuergeschwindigkeit{/g} oder den Trefferzähler von Waffen mit {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salvenangriffen{/g}.
languages.original_text: This backpack grants its wearer a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} or strike count for any weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Rucksack gewährt seinem Träger einen Bonus von +1 auf die {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuergeschwindigkeit{/g} oder den Trefferzähler von Waffen mit {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salvenangriffen{/g}.

languages.text: Ce sac à dos confère à son utilisateur un bonus de +1 à la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} ou au nombre de coups pour toutes les armes capables d'infliger des attaques en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g}.
languages.original_text: This backpack grants its wearer a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} or strike count for any weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks.

Ce sac à dos confère à son utilisateur un bonus de +1 à la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} ou au nombre de coups pour toutes les armes capables d'infliger des attaques en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g}.

languages.text: Bu sırt çantası, takan kişiye {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}seri saldırı{/g} yapabilen her silah için +1 {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}atış hızı{/g} veya atak sayısı kazandırır.
